snippet.title: Secrets of Grindea Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Our pre-order site: http://www.secretsofgrindea.com/index.php/pre-order

Secrets of Grindea is a 2D Action RPG with support for up to 4 players!

After getting a lot of requests from our followers, we're finally launching pre-orders with instant beta access! Pre-ordering will give you a Steam-key as well as a DRM-free version of the game.

Website: http://www.secretsofgrindea.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PixelFerrets
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SecretsOfGrindea
Forums: http://secretsofgrindea.com/forum/index.php
